name: SogoTrade
description: At SogoTrade, we aim to decrease your risk while lowering your cost and maximizing your return.  We seek to offer you the same product at a better price or a better product at the same price.  At SogoTrade, we strive to be the best online brokerage firm in the Industry. You can take advantage of our state of the art Trading Platforms, Advanced Tools, Education Center and much more. There are many online brokers from which to choose. Give us a chance, and we believe you will see the difference.  SogoTrade serves the independent self-directed investor. We believe that you — our client — are our greatest asset. Therefore, your interests come first and always. Our success comes from your ability to execute your decisions effectively using meaningful online trading platforms and market research tools — at a price that is the envy of the online investing industry.
